text: “Ndipo (akafiri) adalumbira Allah ndi malumbiro awo amphamvu kuti ngati chitawadzera chozizwitsa ndithu adzachikhulupirira. Nena: “Zozizwitsa zili kwa Allah (sizili mmanja mwanga). Kodi nchinthu chanji chingakudziwitseni (inu Asilamu) kuti (ngakhale) chitaza (chozizwitsacho) iwo sangakhulupirire?”
